The message of the third angel must go to all 
                                                                           78
people, and Christ has declared that it is to be proclaimed in the highways and in the byways. "Cry aloud, spare not," He commands. This means that wherever they shall present the truth, whether before a public congregation or from house to house, they are to present it as it is revealed in God's Word.-- Manuscript 15, 1909.
